refnamediv.refpurpose: display UnixPlot in an X Window (X11)

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: plot3-X displays an extended UnixPlot file on any workstation running the X Window System (X11R2). As with all X programs, the selected display is determined from the DISPLAY environment variable.
The -v verbose option causes descriptions of the plot commands to be printed.

refsect1.title: BUGS
refsect1.para: This is just the bare bones of a display program at the time of this writing. It needs the ability to rotate, translate, zoom, etc.
